manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: UPGRADE YOUR CAMELBAK KIT From cleaning to rain gear, we've got the accessories you need to upgrade your kit. Shop styles for hike, bike, and run packs and vests to keep your gear (and you) operating at the top of its game.

PERFECT YOUR PACK FOR YOUR NEXT ADVENTURE Magnetic Tube Trap This magnetic tube trap lets you stow your drinking tube in one easy click, so you can drink without taking your eyes off the trail. Compatible with CamelBak Crux Reservoirs only. Tube rotates while magnet stays in placeSeparates into two piecesSelf-seating magnet snaps back into placeFits all 20mm (3/4 inch) webbing Bike Tool Organizer Roll Be prepared for anything the trail throws at your bike. Keep all of your bike tools handy with a compact, lightweight organizer roll. Secure zipper pocketOpen mesh for visibilityTool compression for secure fitEasy-release buckle clasp Hydration Pack Rain Cover This water resistant cover protects your pack and its contents from the elements. Attaches securely with a hook and loop closure and drawstring. To attach the rain cover to your pack, pass the black elastic strap under your shoulder straps, then thread it through the Grey woven loop and attach the velcro. Once it's attached, you can pull the drawstring at the bottom of the rain cover so it fits your pack snugly. High-visibility; reflectivity for low-lightIncludes three easy-to-use attachment points, plus a cinch system for secure fit.

PACK HYDRATION ACCESSORIES Quick Stow Flask Stash it in your running vest, belt, or even in the palm of your hand. This lightweight, collapsible flask features our classic one-piece silicone bite valve for rapid hydration and packs down easily once it’s empty. We designed the Quick Stow to fit easily in the front compartments of all of our running vests. Once it’s empty, it folds down small enough to fit in your pocket. Bite valve self-seals after each drink, eliminating annoying dripsCap is top-rack dishwasher safeVolume indicators in oz and mm for tracking hydrationHang flask upside-down for easy drainage and dryingEmpty flask collapses and folds ultra-compact to fit in most pockets Quick Stow Flask - Tube Adapter Go hands-free with the Quick Stow Flask Tube Adapter. This extension piece allows you to drink from your Quick Stow and Quick Stow Chill flasks without removing them from the shoulder pouches of your backpack or vest. Hydroguard technology Bite valve self-seals to eliminate annoying drips Quick Stow Flask - Bite Valve A replacement bite valve for your Quick Stow flask. The one-piece silicone design delivers rapid hydration and self-seals to eliminate annoying leaks and drips. Bite valve self-seals to eliminate annoying dripsPatented one-piece silicone design Ergo Hydrolock The Camelbak Egro Hydrolock is a simple solution to increasing the comfort of using your hydropack valve. The hydrolock has a 90 degree bend creating a comfortable drinking angle for your valve regardless of the activity you are involved in. It also comes with an on and off switch which easily stops leaks when your hydropack is not being used. Shut off valve lets you control flow90-degree bend for easy drinking on the go.Compatible with most CamelBak reservoirs. *Not compatible with CamelBak Crux reservoirs.

CamelBak Quick Stow Hydration Flask CamelBak Quick Stow Flask Tube Adapter CamelBak Ergo Hydrolock CamelBak Magnetic Tube Trap CamelBak Hydration Pack Rain Cover CamelBak Bike Tool Organizer Roll Use Upgrade the hydration capacity of any pack with an added soft flask. Available in 12, 17, and 21 oz. This extension piece allows you to drink from your Quick Stow and Quick Stow Chill flasks without removing them from the shoulder pouches of your backpack or vest. Increase the comfort of using your hydropack valve. The hydrolock has a 90 degree bend creating a comfortable drinking angle and also comes with an on/off switch which easily stops leaks. This magnetic trap lets you stow your drinking tube in one easy click, so you can drink without taking your eyes off the trail. The trap is compatible with CamelBak Crux reservoirs only. This water retube sistant cover protects your pack and its contents from the elements. Attaches securely with a hook and loop closure and drawstring. Keep all of your bike tools handy with a compact, lightweight organizer roll. Weight 35-40 g / 1.2-1.4 oz 14 g / .5 oz 9 g / .32 oz 28 g / 1 oz S/M: 85 g / 3 oz; M/L: 91 g / 3.2 oz 56 g / 2 oz Size 12 oz, 17 oz, 21 oz 1 x 1 x 1 in 0.4 x 0.4 x 0.4 in 13.4 x 10.6 x 7.9 in S/M fits packs 1000-1500 cu in or 16L to 25L; M/L fits packs 1500-2300 cu in or 25L to 38L. 12 x 6.7 x 1.2 in, expanded Compatible With Most CamelBak packs, vests, and waist packs All CamelBak Quick Stow flasks Camelbak Antidote reservoirs. CamelBak Crux Reservoirs only All CamelBak packs All CamelBak packs

About CamelBak Founded in 1989, CamelBak invented the hands-free hydration category and is the global leader in outdoor hydration. CamelBak continues to reinvent hydration and carry solutions that empower an active lifestyle through award-winning products that include everything from technical hydration packs to reusable bottles.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for Disney World
reviews.reviewText: I purchased these to take to Disney World in our park bag. I was looking for water bottles that wouldn’t take up much space and would leak. These were perfect! I bought one for each member of my family, and we were able to easily refill them with ice (the opening is wide enough), they didn’t leak, and they took up very little space in our bag.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this for short rides or hikes.
reviews.reviewText: I put my coffee in it before I take a bike ride. It’s perfect size for a Fanny pack or something similar. Never leakes unless you put the lid on wrong. Great quality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 10, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just right for me...
reviews.reviewText: This is a really nice "mini water bladder". It's construction is typical Camelbak. The bladder material seems thick enough and welded well to prevent leaks. With the shut off valve in the closed position, the silicon bite valve won't leak. I've been keeping it in a small sling bag and use it as a cooling cushion between my back and a chair while sitting outside in 90°F heat. Of course I also drink water from it as well. Holds just enough water to keep me from feeling dehydrated while I'm walking about. I haven't strictly measured it's volume but I strongly feel that it only holds about 10 oz. of water, not the advertised 12 oz. I'm not deducting a star for that because the build quality, choice of materials, design, and the Camelbak lifetime warranty all combine to bake this a very worthwhile purchase for me and my needs. A few more things I feel I should mention...the inside of the flask is coated with an antimicrobial treatment (some kind of silver impregnation). I've just let my flask air dry and do far there's been no problems with gunk or funny tastes. The silicon bite valve can be pulled off for a more thorough cleaning or for attaching a drinking hose. And finally, there's a semi-stiff collar at the top of the flask to home on to while you tighten the cap. I've read reviews on the chill version of this flask that say that the chill version doesn't have this collar, which makes it very difficult to screw on the cap. The only difference between this and the QuickStow chill flask is that there's a thin layer of closed cell foam between the inner and outer layer of the chill flask. It's only supposed to keep liquids cool twice as long as this flask. Not enough to convince to buy it instead of this one. All in all I'm glad that I bought this Camelbak QuickStow flask. Matter of fact, I bought two!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for running
reviews.reviewText: I got this for my sister who likes to run 3-5 miles in the morning. She has a vest for trail running and her longer runs but this bottle is great for quick runs. Very durable, according to her & far superior to some others she has had.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Camelback solid product
reviews.reviewText: I am thoroughly pleased with this water bottle. It fits perfectly in my hand. It is not a hard silicon; which therefore allows it to collapse easily. I generally only walk 2-3 miles so it is a correct amount of water (it was 93 degrees at 6 pm). I had water left when I was finished. I will note that I breathe through my nose when I exercise. This results in less thirst. Anyway ........ I would recommend this water bottle. I’ve ordered 2 more.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Bottle tolerance leads to leaks
reviews.reviewText: I ordered this bottle to go with a hydration belt that came with only one bottle of this brand/size. The first two times I used this bottle, it leaked from where the top screws into the bottom. I tried switching the tops between my two bottles, and that fixed the leaking issue. The top and/or bottom must have been machined in a way that the threads didn't line up when one or both is too close to their machining tolerance. If I didn't have the ability to switch them, I would have been very disappointed with how much it leaked in my belt pouch.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Reusable Juice Pouch
reviews.reviewText: I got sick of paying for juice pouches when the bottle is half the cost. Not to mention the guilt over the environmental impact (the pouches, the straws, the straw packaging, and the box they come in!). These turned out to be the perfect solution. They hold more than a juice pouch holds (but if you want less, just don't pour as much in). They are easy to fill, easy for my kids to use, durable, and easy to wash! I'm ordering more now so that when we return to in-person school, I can have a spare set if the kids lose one or if I forget to wash them before the morning. These can also be used by adults to pack along whatever beverage you enjoy ;)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Tastes like plastic
reviews.reviewText: I’ve washed this three times and can’t get the taste of plastic out. Imagining all the micoolastics going into my body with every sip.

reviews.reviewTitle: So handy for skiing! fits in my jacket breast pocket
reviews.reviewText: Super handy product for skiing - doesnt freeze. needs to be rinsed a couple times and still get a bit of a plastic taste after a few hours but that's to be expected from this material (same as my large bladder for my rucksack) Really handy for touring/on chairlifts - will possibly buy the bigger size at some point.The lid is a bit bulky - doesn't feel like it needs to be so maybe worth considering

reviews.reviewTitle: etwas stabiler als die von Slamon
reviews.reviewText: etwas stabiler als die von Slamon, was Vor und Nachteile hat. Ansonsten sehr gut wie beschrieben

J'ai un sac pour le trail Camelbak avec un poche à eau 1.5l Camelbak que j'ai changée une fois.J'ai acheté une première Flask qui venait avec une ceinture Camelbak ULTRA BELT 17OZ=0.5 L BLACK 22.Cette ceinture permet d'en avoir 2 donc 2x0.5l. J'en rachète donc une pour pouvoir porter 1l au besoin.La flask est parfaite, elle s'aplatie plus qu'elle se vide. Le système pour boire, la tétine et très bien fait.J'ai remarqué que chez Camelbak ils les font très bien.
